name: bigman does platforming (kinda like celeste but not really)
name_original: bigman does platforming (kinda like celeste but not really)
description:
this is a game that i am currently developing

please give feedback in the comments

most of the images (including all of the current player sprites, and the background) were made by my friend dusty

dusty's youtube-https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCPKtev_zynnF6_YWwR0bZ

some images (including the cover and the spikes) were made by my friend bein

bein's youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTpvTNkdzJd2LRPbnvDXQIw

Default Controls:

Z - jump

X - sprint

C - dash

LEFT_ARROW - accelerate left

RIGHT_ARROW - accelerate right

DOWN_ARROW - increase downward acceleration

Z (in air) - reduce downward acceleration

LEFT_ARROW and RIGHT_ARROW - halt horizontal acceleration

Patch Notes:

0.1.0- initial release to itch.io

0.2.0- added levels 4 and 5

0.3.0- added level 6 and reworked collision and movement

0.3.1- made holding down more effective

0.4.0- customizable controls on startup

0.4.1- made customizable controls actually work and added prompt for left shift

0.5.0- changed all of the sprites and some of the titles (courtesy of my friend dusty)
